attributes.action: Repeal the European Communities Act 1972 bypassing EU legislation Article 50
attributes.additional_details:
The European Communities Act 1972
http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1972/68/section/2

EU legislation Article 50
http://www.lisbon-treaty.org/wcm/the-lisbon-treaty/treaty-on-European-union-and-comments/title-6-final-provisions/137-article-50.html

Article 50 only exists in order for the EU to get more money out of a former member state and negotiate a good deal for them whether it works out good for us or not.  Lets cut the cord, we voted out so we are out now, not years down the line.
attributes.background: The govenment wants to oblige the EU and start down the road to EU legislation Article 50, If we Repeal The European Communities Act 1972 it bypasses any EU legislation & we are instantly out of the EU. We wont have to pay 2 years worth of money & our country cant be held to ransom by the corrupt EU
